channel.title: stc on The Githuka's Notebook

item.title: My Encounter With The STC Microcontrollers
item.description: The first time I held an STC microcontroller was today morning when we were preparing the lab ahead of the class experiment for tomorrow. I decided to assemble my own board from the components given. The boards were packed tightly in bulk so it was quite a task to set them up. The boards which I later came to learn were designed by one of the Chinese’s lecturers students back in China.
